errors.404.title: Page not found
errors.404.message: The page you are looking for does not exist.
errors.500.title: Internal server error
errors.500.message: Ouch! Our server is having some issues. Please try again later.
errors.400.title: Bad request
errors.400.message: The request you made is invalid.
errors.429.title: Rate limited
api.player-not-found: Player with the provided UID does not exist.
api.aap-terminated: The request was rejected by AAP system. Reason: {{reason}} ({{code}}).
loader.message.invalid-uid: The UID provided is invalid. It must be a 9-digit number starting with 5,6,7,8 or 9.
loader.message.player-not-found: Player with the provided UID does not exist.
loader.message.invalid-guide-id: The guide you are looking for does not exist.
ui.text.cfg-wont-be-saved-desc: Your configuration will be lost when you leave this page. Configuration saving is an upcoming feature that will be available to registered users.
ui.text.something-went-wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
ui.text.drop-file-description: Drag and drop your import file obtained from Wuthery Sniffer to quickly import all your data.
ui.text.import-to-view: Import your data to view this.
ui.text.import-fresh: Import your fresh data to view this.
ui.text.footer: Â© {{year}} Wuthery Project. All rights reserved.
ui.text.profile-soon: More info coming soon with profiles.
ui.text.search-description: Find players on any Overseas server using their UID.
ui.text.search-body-1: At the moment, we support all Overseas servers. CN servers are not supported. You can read more about the correct way to determine server from UID in docs.
ui.text.search-body-2: We only display the information you can see in-game. Any other information like characters stats, weapons, echoes, etc. are not available as of now.
ui.text.search-body-3: Wuthery does not provide public API at the moment. This will definitely change in the future, but for now, we are focusing on the website.
ui.text.guides-desc: Guides on how to use Wuthery and our services.
ui.text.no-guides-found: No guides found for your search query.
meta.home.title: Wuthery
meta.home.description: A website for players and developers where you can view characters, weapons, profiles of players from Wuthering Waves.
meta.404.title: Page not found
meta.404.description: Oops! The link points to a page that does not exist.
meta.player.title: {{name}}'s profile - Wuthery
meta.player.description: View {{name}}'s profile, characters, weapons, and more on Wuthery.
meta.search.title: Search - Wuthery
meta.search.description: Find players on any Overseas server using their UID.
meta.import.title: Data Import - Wuthery
meta.import.description: Import your data on Wuthery to view your profile, characters, weapons, and more.
meta.character.title: Import character - Wuthery
meta.character.description: View your imported characters and create beautiful cards to share with your friends.
meta.guides.title: Guides - Wuthery
meta.guides.description: Read guides and tutorials on how to use Wuthery and our services.
